briefTitle: Novel Surrogate Markers as Predictors of Radiation Toxicity in Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Helical Tomotherapy Compared to Standard Radiation Therapy
officialTitle: Novel Surrogate Markers as Predictors of Radiation Toxicity in Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Helical Tomotherapy Compared to Standard Radiation Therapy
conditions: Genetic Markers, Cardiac Toxicity, Breast and Skin Motion
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* early breast cancer treated with lumpectomy
* must have T1-2 N0-1 invasive carcinoma of the breast
* must sign an informed consent
* must be at least 18 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* collagen vascular disease
* metastatic disease
* pregnant or lactating
